name: X-EL™ Odor Eliminator
description: X-EL™ Odor Eliminator enriches a wide variety of polymers with heat resistance and odor protection in high and low humidity environments. Strong smells like dirty clothing, ammonia and organic waste are not just masked, but completely eliminated. This is designed to protect the health and well-being of both people and planet, our performance additives serve to reduce environmental impact while profoundly enhancing the behavior and beneficial properties of plastic.
